detailed_analysis.transcription: I am calling about an issue with my credit card bill I have been getting some strange charges and I need you to walk me through all recent transactions please provide me the transaction IDs Merchants names and amounts charged for all the transactions in the last 30 days I've lost track of my credit card so I can't look up the information for myself

gemini_analysis.explanation: The caller claims to have lost their credit card and needs the representative to read off all transactions in the last 30 days. This is a common tactic used by fraudsters to gather information about the victim's account and make unauthorized purchases.
red_flags: Caller claims to have lost their credit card.
Caller requests all transactions in the last 30 days.
recommendations: Do not provide any personal or financial information to the caller.
Contact the credit card company directly to report the lost card and dispute any unauthorized charges.
